-- | provides a backend implementation to EKG
@package lobemo-backend-ekg
@version 0.2.0.1

module Cardano.BM.Backend.EKGView
data EKGView a
plugin :: (IsEffectuator s a, ToJSON a, FromJSON a) => Configuration -> Trace IO a -> s a -> IO (Plugin a)
instance GHC.Show.Show Cardano.BM.Backend.EKGView.EKGBackendFailure
instance (Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON a, Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON a) => Cardano.BM.Data.Backend.IsBackend Cardano.BM.Backend.EKGView.EKGView a
instance GHC.Exception.Type.Exception Cardano.BM.Backend.EKGView.EKGBackendFailure
instance Cardano.BM.Data.Backend.IsEffectuator Cardano.BM.Backend.EKGView.EKGView a
